name: Aim Trainer (liam.stone707)
description:
GAMEPLAY

Don't let the circles reach the RGB square! 

CONTROLS

Space to pause. Esc to quit. Bottom-right button links to my guitar YT channel, which will soon have some videos (I promise). Top-left button pauses the game. This game is still in development: I plan on adding menu, custom music, etc. Stay tuned.

ALSO

If you encounter a weird bug, please leave a comment and I will try to fix it. :) Always feel free to donate as well.
